name: Ana Martínez
bio: Graphic designer with a passion for urban art and language exchange. Love helping people learn Spanish!

name: Hussein El Amrani
bio: Software engineer and open-source enthusiast. Offering coding mentorship and web development help.

name: Fatima Zahra Benali
bio: Primary school teacher who loves baking and crafts. Happy to help with tutoring kids or Moroccan recipes!

name: Youssef Tazi
bio: Fitness coach and nutrition enthusiast near the corniche. Let's train together or swap skills!

name: Khadija Moussaoui
bio: Accountant by day, amateur photographer on weekends. Offering finance help and photo walks around the city.

name: Omar Berrada
bio: Architect and urban planning nerd. I sketch buildings and love discussing city design over coffee.

name: Nadia Senhaji
bio: Freelance translator (FR/EN/AR) and book lover. I also teach calligraphy on weekends.

name: Tariq El Fassi
bio: Electrician with 10 years of experience. I also teach basic home repairs to those who want to learn.

name: Samira Idrissi
bio: Social worker and community organizer. Passionate about connecting people and sharing traditional crafts.

name: Mehdi Chaoui
bio: Music producer and guitar teacher. I give lessons from home and produce beats in my spare time.

name: Layla Benjelloun
bio: Marketing consultant and yoga instructor. I love helping small businesses grow and keeping my mind zen.

name: Rachid Ouali
bio: Car mechanic and weekend chef. I fix cars and cook amazing tagines. Swap skills anytime!

name: Imane Tlemcani
bio: Pediatric nurse and first-aid trainer. I offer health education sessions and love gardening in my free time.

name: Karim Ziani
bio: Math teacher at a local lycée. Offering tutoring for bac students and interested in learning music.

name: Zineb El Harti
bio: Fashion designer and seamstress. I create traditional and modern pieces and teach sewing from my atelier.

name: Amine Bensouda
bio: Data analyst who loves cycling. I help with Excel, Power BI, and organize weekend group rides.

name: Houda Sqalli
bio: Chef and culinary arts instructor. Moroccan cuisine is my specialty, but I love fusion experiments!

name: Saad Kettani
bio: Civil engineer and chess enthusiast. I help with structural questions and run a weekly chess club.

name: Dounia Alaoui
bio: Interior designer and plant mom. I redesign small spaces on a budget and teach basic DIY home décor.

name: Reda Hajjami
bio: Barber and hairstylist for 8 years. I also do wedding grooming and teach basic barbering techniques.

name: Yasmine Cherkaoui
bio: Journalist and creative writing coach. I help people tell their stories and run a local writing circle.

name: Khalid Bennani
bio: Marine biologist and scuba diving instructor. Passionate about ocean conservation and water sports.

name: Meriem Bakkali
bio: Ceramics artist and art therapist. My workshop is open on weekends for anyone who wants to try pottery.

name: Adil Rouchdi
bio: Solar energy technician and sustainability advocate. I install panels and teach about renewable energy.

name: Sara El Ouazzani
bio: Pediatrician and mindful parenting coach. I offer health consultations and parenting workshops for new parents.

name: Yassine Amrani
bio: Passionate about photography and capturing the beauty of everyday Casablanca life.

name: Salma Idrissi
bio: Yoga instructor helping people find balance and mindfulness in busy city life.

name: Hicham Nouri
bio: Home repair specialist with skills in plumbing and electrical work.

name: Imane Fassi
bio: Makeup artist specializing in bridal and event looks. Skincare enthusiast.

name: Karim Ouali
bio: Surf enthusiast and swimming instructor. Catch me at the beach every weekend!

name: Nadia Rami
bio: Cooking lover passionate about Moroccan cuisine and pastry. Always happy to share recipes!

name: Omar Zahraoui
bio: Traditional craftsman specializing in wood carving and handmade décor pieces.

name: Bilal Tahiri
bio: Martial arts instructor teaching karate and judo to kids and adults.

name: Adil Benali
bio: Car mechanic skilled in engine diagnostics and all types of vehicle repair.

name: Yacine Benmoussa
bio: Jazz musician and piano teacher. Performing locally and offering lessons for all levels.

name: Rachid Kabbaj
bio: Boxing trainer and self-defense instructor. Fitness and discipline are my passion.

name: Fares Moukrim
bio: Fashion photographer and visual storyteller. Helping brands and individuals build their image.

name: Younes Fadili
bio: Carpenter skilled in furniture making and wood repair. Custom pieces are my specialty.

name: Nassim Bouhout
bio: Tennis coach and fitness trainer. Helping players of all levels improve their game.

name: Zakaria Bennis
bio: Guitar player and music composer. Happy to share lessons and jam sessions.

name: Hamza Bertal
bio: Graphic illustrator and street artist. Creating murals and digital art across the city.

name: Soufiane Berrada
bio: Baker and pastry chef. Specializing in custom cakes, croissants, and Moroccan sweets.

name: Ziad Alami
bio: Small business consultant helping entrepreneurs grow with practical advice and sales strategies.

name: Ayoub Dlimi
bio: Drummer and rhythm trainer. Playing in a band and offering drum lessons from beginner to intermediate.

name: Ismail Ghazi
bio: Youth sports coach specializing in basketball and athletics for kids aged 8-16.

name: Othmane Rifai
bio: Language teacher fluent in French and Arabic. Offering private lessons and group sessions.

name: Anas Guessous
bio: English tutor specializing in conversational practice and exam preparation.

name: Badr Filali
bio: Calligrapher and Arabic typography artist. Offering workshops and custom commissions.

name: Mouad Chraibi
bio: Traditional cook keeping Moroccan culinary heritage alive through couscous and tagine classes.

name: Nabil Lahmidi
bio: Beach photographer and drone operator. Capturing stunning coastal landscapes around Casablanca.

text: Golden hour in Maarif never disappoints 🌇 I spent the afternoon capturing the old architecture on Rue Soumaya — the light hitting the mosaic tiles was unreal. If anyone wants prints for their home or office, DM me!
Found: a Canon camera lens cap near the Maarif park fountain. Looks like it belongs to a 50mm lens. If you were shooting in the area this Sunday morning, it might be yours — DM me to describe it 📷

Morning yoga on the rooftop in Anfa was absolutely magical today — 15 neighbors joined and we ended the session watching the city wake up ☀️🧘‍♀️ We're making this a weekly Sunday ritual. All levels welcome, just bring a mat!

Swapping yoga and meditation sessions for nutrition coaching! I teach people to breathe and slow down, but I could really use someone to help me build a balanced meal plan. Any nutritionists in Anfa or nearby? 🥗🧘

Heads up Hay Hassani neighbors: if your water pressure has dropped recently, it might be a blockage in the main building valve — very common in older buildings this time of year. Happy to take a quick look for free, just reach out 🔧

Offering plumbing and electrical repair help in exchange for business management advice! I know my way around pipes and wires but I want to grow my freelance work into something more structured. Any business coaches willing to trade? 💡🔩

Bridal season is in full swing! Just finished a 12-hour wedding day in Sidi Maarouf and the bride cried when she saw herself 😭💍 If you're getting married this summer and need a makeup artist who truly cares, my calendar still has a few spots.

Trading makeup and skincare sessions for public speaking coaching! I can do a full glam transformation, help with your skin routine or guide your bridal party — and in return I'd love to work on my confidence on stage. Swap anyone? 💄🎤

The waves at Ain Diab were absolutely firing this Saturday morning! 🏄 If you've been thinking about learning to surf, now is the perfect season. I'm running beginner sessions every weekend — small groups, safe conditions, guaranteed smiles!

Swapping surfing and swimming lessons for guitar lessons! I spend all my time in the water but I've always dreamed of playing music around a beach bonfire 🎸🌊 Any guitarist in Ain Diab or Corniche area up for a trade?

Made a huge pot of harira this afternoon and my neighbors approved unanimously 🍲 Sharing the recipe in the comments! Tip: the secret is letting the tomatoes and celery cook low and slow before adding the lemon. Enjoy! 🍋

Willing to teach Moroccan cooking and pastry in exchange for English lessons! My msemen is legendary but my English needs serious work 😄 If you're patient and hungry, this is the perfect swap. Who's in, Bourgogne area?

Just finished a hand-carved cedar wood frame for a neighbor in Derb Sultan — took 3 days and over 200 individual cuts. Traditional Moroccan craftsmanship takes patience but the result is something no machine can replicate 🪵✨

Offering wood carving and handmade décor pieces in exchange for marketing help! I make beautiful things but I have no idea how to sell them online. Someone please teach me Instagram and I'll carve you something special 🪵📱

Big congratulations to all the kids who passed their karate grading last Saturday in Racine! 🥋 8 yellow belts and 3 orange belts earned with real hard work and discipline. Proud coach moment. Next training open to new students from age 7!

Swapping karate and self-defense lessons for fitness coaching! I can teach you discipline, technique and confidence — in exchange I'd love a structured gym program to complement my martial arts. Any personal trainers in the Racine area? 💪🥋

Free engine checkup this weekend for Sbata neighbors! 🚗 With summer heat coming, overheating is a real risk. Bring your car Saturday morning and I'll check your coolant, belts and battery at no charge. First come, first served.

Trading car repair and engine diagnostics for French lessons! I can fix any engine but I can't conjugate a verb to save my life 😅 If you speak French and your car needs work, this is the most practical swap you'll ever make. Sbata area.

Just played a jazz set at the Belvedere cultural café last night — the crowd was incredible, thank you to everyone who came 🎹🎷 Recording is available if you want to listen. Next live session in 3 weeks, follow for updates!

Swapping piano and music theory lessons for photography sessions! I want to build a proper press kit with professional photos for my music career. Any photographers in Belvedere or Maarif area willing to collaborate? 🎹📸

The Hay Mohammadi boxing club wrapped up its amateur tournament — what an incredible night of heart and determination from all the fighters! 🥊 Special shoutout to young Hamza, 16 years old, who went 3 rounds against someone twice his size and never quit.

Offering boxing training and self-defense classes in exchange for nutrition coaching! I train hard but I eat like a teenager 😅 If you're a nutritionist willing to swap, I'll get you in the best shape of your life. Serious offers only please 🥊🥗

Just wrapped a full brand photoshoot for a local clothing designer in Gauthier — 4 hours, 3 looks, one incredible story told through images 📸 If your brand needs a visual identity that actually connects with people, let's talk.

Swapping fashion and portrait photography for video editing lessons! I shoot everything but editing video is a completely different skill set that I haven't mastered yet. Any video editors up for a creative trade? 🎬📸

Finished building a custom walnut bookshelf for a family in Sidi Othmane this week — floor to ceiling, 5 shelves, hand-joined corners. No nails, no shortcuts 🪵 If you need custom furniture that will last generations, message me for a quote.

Trading furniture making and wood repair for French lessons! I've been in Casablanca for years and my French is still embarrassing 😅 I can build or fix anything wooden — in exchange, please help me hold a proper conversation. Anyone in Sidi Othmane?

Summer tennis league in Californie kicks off next weekend! 🎾 We have spots for 6 more players — singles and doubles format, all intermediate levels welcome. Great way to stay active, meet neighbors and compete in a friendly spirit. Comment to join!

Offering tennis coaching and fitness training in exchange for English lessons! I want to communicate better with international players and expand my coaching reach. If you speak English and need to get fit, this is your sign 🎾📚

Hosted an acoustic jam session in the Oasis neighborhood garden last Sunday — 6 musicians, zero planning, pure magic 🎸🌿 We played for 2 hours straight and neighbors came down to listen from their balconies. Let's do this monthly!

Swapping guitar lessons and music composition for singing coaching! I can teach you chords, fingerpicking or how to write your own songs — in exchange I really need to develop my voice. Any vocal coaches in the Oasis area? 🎸🎤

Just completed a new mural on the corner of Rue Palmier and Avenue Hassan II — it's a tribute to old Casablanca with geometric zellige patterns blending into modern skyline shapes 🎨 Come see it in person, photos don't do it justice!

Trading illustration and digital design for photography lessons! I create visuals every day but I've never learned how to shoot properly. Any photographer willing to trade skills for custom artwork? 🖌️📸 Open to all styles.

Fresh batch of msemen croissant fusion pastries out of the oven this morning in Lissasfa 🥐 I've been experimenting with combining French viennoiserie techniques with Moroccan flavors — the result is something truly special. Free taste test for neighbors this Saturday!

Offering baking and pastry classes in exchange for business planning help! I want to open a small bakery but I have no idea how to write a business plan or manage finances. Anyone willing to swap? I'll keep you fed with croissants 🥐📊

Just helped a young founder in Derb Omar go from 0 to first paying client in 3 weeks! 🎉 The key was narrowing his target market and creating a very clear value proposition. If your business feels stuck, sometimes one focused conversation is all it takes.

Swapping business advice and sales strategy for public speaking coaching! I help people grow businesses but when I have to present in front of a crowd my brain goes blank 😅 Any communication coaches or Toastmasters members in Casablanca?

The Mers Sultan neighborhood band just played its first public performance at the community center and wow — the energy was electric! 🥁🎸🎹 We've been rehearsing for 3 months and seeing people dance made every practice worth it. More shows coming soon!

Trading drum lessons and rhythm training for guitar lessons! Every drummer dreams of being a guitarist too 🥁🎸 I'll teach you to keep time perfectly, you teach me a few riffs. Anyone in Mers Sultan or nearby up for a musical swap?

Our under-14 basketball team from Hay Al Amal just won their first inter-neighborhood tournament! 🏀🏆 These kids trained twice a week for 4 months — no fancy gym, just a concrete court and a lot of heart. So incredibly proud of every single one of them!

Offering basketball coaching and team sports training for English lessons! I want to be able to communicate with players and coaches from other countries and watch tutorials in English. Any English teachers willing to trade for sports coaching? 🏀📚

Starting a free French conversation group in Val Fleuri every Tuesday evening! Whether you're a beginner or just need practice, all levels are welcome. The goal is simple: speak more, fear less. First session this Tuesday at 7pm 🗣️🇫🇷

Swapping French and Arabic tutoring for Spanish lessons! I teach both official languages fluently but I've always wanted to add Spanish to my repertoire. Any Spanish speakers in Val Fleuri or nearby willing to exchange lessons? 🇫🇷🇲🇦🇪🇸

Two of my IELTS students just got their results — one scored 7.5 and the other 8.0! 🎉 Both started with me just 10 weeks ago. If you're preparing for IELTS, TOEFL or just want confident English conversation skills, I have spots opening up next month.

Trading English tutoring and conversation practice for French lessons! My English is strong but my professional French is holding me back. If you're a French speaker who needs English, this is the most practical exchange you can make 🇬🇧🇫🇷

Just completed a commissioned piece — the name 'Casablanca' written in full Diwani script, framed on handmade cotton paper 🖋️ Arabic calligraphy carries centuries of beauty in every curve. If you'd like a custom piece for your home or as a gift, DM me for pricing.

Swapping calligraphy and Arabic typography workshops for photography lessons! My work deserves better photos than what my phone produces 😅 I'll teach you the art of ink and letters — you teach me how to capture them beautifully. Anyone in 2 Mars or nearby? 🖋️📸

Organized a traditional couscous Friday at my place in Hay El Farah — 20 neighbors, one giant pot, endless conversation 🍚💛 This is exactly what our platform is about. Food brings people together like nothing else. Next gathering in 3 weeks, everyone welcome!

Swapping traditional Moroccan cooking — couscous, tagine, mrouzia — for pastry lessons! I can feed an entire neighborhood but my baking skills stop at bread 😄 Any pastry lovers willing to teach in exchange for an authentic home-cooked feast? 🍲🥐

Flew my drone at sunrise over Dar Bouazza beach this morning — the colors were absolutely otherworldly 🌅🚁 I'll be posting the full aerial sequence this week. If you're a business, hotel or real estate developer who needs stunning aerial coverage of the coastline, reach out!

Swapping aerial photography and drone shooting for video editing lessons! I can capture incredible footage but the editing is where I lose confidence. If you know Premiere Pro or DaVinci Resolve and want stunning coastal shots in return, let's connect 🚁🎬
